response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted with the highest quality materials and cutting-edge technology, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking unparalleled performance and durability. I understand that its value may be subjective, but based on our research and customer feedback, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing our customers with top-tier solutions. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your needs.", "product_price": 12000}
